name: The Fortress
description:
All of a sudden you wake up in the middle of a forest with a weird guy welcoming you to a fortress made of wood. After a few inquiries, you realize there's a bit more to this fortress than merely a bunch of crazed fellas playing camp.

For now, a short visual novel made for NaNoRenO, we still intend to expand it in post-mortem adding, aside from quality of life improvements and more content, eventually some RPG and RTS elements, so stay tuned!
